data.description:
Summary and discussion of Human Rights Watch autonomous military robot report: https://www.hrw.org/report/2016/12/09/making-case/dangers-killer-robots-and-need-preemptive-ban
(Reading isn't required, but highly recommended for context!)

As a tool to understand the difficulty of programming ethical robots, we'll also be using Asimovâ€™s laws of robotics: https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Three_Laws_of_Robotics
